answers.answer: well did you drink alcohol? did you drink enough water  dehydration can do this , vertigo is a bed spin symptom , medication can cause this  do you have high blood pressure? or low  are you over wt do you eat alot of salt?  did you ever hurt your neck  artheritis   did you have middle ear infections? it could be your ears or water in your ears?  sinus congestion lots of things you can do and change or have a dr check you over

question: I am a 43 yr old woman that has not been diagnose with diabetes but have had a couple of weird incidents.I woke up one night to use the bathroom and went back to bed and I felt the room spinning for about 3 minutes, can it be diabetes or something else please help I don' know where to turn to. thank yolanda
title: spinning room
